name: Rawhide Drum
description: On Arrival, all survivors gain +1 insanity. Inspirational Drumming! When you perform encourage, all non-deaf survivors are affected.

name: Bandages
description: (flash): Remove up to 2 bleeding tokens from yourself or an adjacent survivor.

name: Whisker Harp
description: On Arrival, all survivors gain +1 survival. (flash): Strum. Roll 1d10. On a result of 6+ discard 1 mood currently in play.

name: Cat Eye Circlet
description: (flash): Reveal the next 3 monster hit locations and put them back in any order.

name: Frenzy Drink
description: (flash) Consume: Suffer Frenzy brain trauma. Can be used once per showdown.

name: Blood Sheath
description: Block 1. When Rainbow Katana is left of Blood Sheath, it loses Frail and gains Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt).

name: Monster Tooth Necklace
description: Gain +1 strength. (square red)(square red) +1 strength

name: Monster Grease
description: Gain +1 evasion. (square green)(square green)(square green) +1 evasion

name: Lucky Charm
description: (square blue)(square blue) +1 luck

name: Fecal Salve
description: When you depart, gain +1 survival. (flash): You are not a threat until you attack. If you have the priority target token, remove it.

name: Dried Acanthus
description: When you depart, gain +2 survival. When you suffer a severe injury, ignore it and archive this card instead.

name: Stone Noses
description: On Arrival, gain +1 survival, +1 insanity. Arrival: At the start of the showdown.

name: Almanac
description: When you depart, gain +2 insanity. You cannot gain disorders.

name: Brain Mint
description: (flash)Consume: Remove all your tokens and stand up. You may use this while knocked down. Use once per showdown.

name: Elder Earrings
description: At start of showdown, gain +2 survival. +1 Hunt XP after a showdown.

name: First Aid Kit
description: On Arrival, all survivors gain +3 survival. (flash): Remove 1 bleeding or negative attribute token from yourself or an adjacent survivor.

name: Scavenger Kit
description: Unique. When you defeat a monster, gain either 1 random basic resource or 1 random monster resource from that monsters's resource deck.

name: Speed Powder
description: (flash): Suffer 2 brain damage. Gain +1 speed token. Use once per showdown.

name: Bug Trap
description: At the start of the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 3+, add a Bug Patch terrain card to the showdown board.

name: Musk Bomb
description: If adjacent to monster when it draws AI Card, you may spend 2 survival and archive Musk bomb to roll 1d10. On a 3+, discard AI Card without playing it.

name: Final Lantern
description: Vital. On Arrival, all survivors gain the Horripilation survivor status card. (See the Watcher's AI deck). When not insane, flip this card.

name: Blood Paint
description: (flash): Activate weapon gear to the left and right of this card. These are two separate attacks. Cannot be used with two-handed weapons.

name: Red Charm
description: (square red)(square red)(square red)(square red)(square red) Unstoppable: When you attempt to wound, instead roll 1d10. On 1-5, fail. On 6-10, wound.

name: Green Charm
description: (square green)(square green)(square green)(square green)(square green) Undeathable: If you would die, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you inexplicably survive.

name: Blue Charm
description: (square blue)(square blue)(square blue)(square blue)(square blue) Unshakeable: If you draw a Trap, roll 1d10. On a 6+, discard the Trap and reshuffle the deck.

name: Bone Earrings
description: At the start of the showdown, gain +2 speed and +2 strength tokens if insane and all gear in your gear grid has the bone keyword.

name: Boss Mehndi
description: Boss is brave. While adjacent to you, insane survivors gain +1 speed.

name: Bloom Sphere
description: (puzzle green)(puzzle blue) When you are picked as target, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster must pick a new target if possible.

name: Bird Bread
description: (flash) Consume: Once per showdown, add (shieldone) to all hit locations. Gain priority target token. Roll 1d10. On a 1, reduce your survival to 0.

name: Crest Crown
description: (flash): if insane, reshuffle hit location deck. (puzzle green)(puzzle blue)(puzzle red) When you depart, gain +1 insanity and +1 survival for every (square blue) you have.

name: Hours Ring
description: Unique. During the aftermath, if you died or ceased to exist, you may archive the Hours Ring and reset the campaign to the previous Settlement Phase's develop step before you departed.

name: Feather Mantle
description: When you suffer knockback, you may ignore collision with other survivors and reduce the movement by up to 3 spaces.
